availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Salathiel Boone Voris (Jefferson County, Kentucky railroad contractor)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky railroad contractor. Kentucky native. Married Mary Jane Wooldridge Voris in 1860. Father of Annette Voris and Harry Voris. Employed as a railroad contractor in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Marriages, Film #266203, p 5.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Middletown, p. 392A
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #7007129, Jefferson County Deaths, May 1896.
“SICK THREE DAYS: Capt. S. B. Voris, Capitalist, a Victim of Heart Failure Was a Conductor On the Short Line In Its Early Days,”_Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.)15 May 1896: p. 8.
